title: Ep 105: A Masterclass On Solo Hosting With Kate Kennedy
itunes:title: Ep 105: A Masterclass On Solo Hosting With Kate Kennedy
itunes:subtitle: Be There In Five's host is back to help me figure out what Gee Thanks! will look like in 2022.
description:
Happy 2022! I am thinking about new things I can do with this podcast. Is it: more episodes? More mini episodes? A rotating small cast of recurring guest hosts? Call in episodes? Having listeners on the show? Weirdly, a lot of people said I should do some solo episodes talking about a product or two each week. I am super down for that, but it also makes me extremely nervous! So I called my friend Kate Kennedy of Be There In Five and asked her if she’d share some solo podcasting tips with me. I remain still overwhelmed but less overwhelmed than before! 


If you missed my episode of Be There In Five, listen here: https://bethereinfive.com/podcast/2021/12/18/why-buy-the-cowl-with-caroline-moss 


And Kate’s prior episode of Gee Thanks!: https://play.acast.com/s/geethanksjustboughtit/ep90-bravo-bravo-bravowithkatekennedy 


Gee Thanks! is powered by subscribers like you! To keep all of our Gee Thanks! content free and accessible to all, consider making a monthly donation of $2 to keep us going. 


Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod and shop all of our recs here: www.geethanksjustboughtit.com 


As always, reach me at Caroline@geethanksjustboughtit.com, @geethanksjustboughtitpod on Instagram, or leave me a message at 424-245-0736.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
